      Methods in org.apache.juneau that throw BeanRuntimeException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BeanPropertyMeta.add(BeanMap<?> m, Object value)
      Adds a value to a Collection or array property.
      <T> BeanMap<T> BeanContext.forBean(T o, Class<? super T> c)
      Wraps an object inside a BeanMap object (i.e.: a modifiable Map) defined as a bean for one of its class, a super class, or an implemented interface.
      <T> T BeanContext.newBean(Class<T> c)
      Creates a new empty bean of the specified type, except used for instantiating inner member classes that must be instantiated within another class instance.
      <T> T BeanContext.newBean(Object outer, Class<T> c)
      Same as BeanContext.newBean(Class), except used for instantiating inner member classes that must be instantiated within another class instance.
      Object BeanPropertyMeta.set(BeanMap<?> m, Object value)
      Equivalent to calling BeanMap.put(String, Object), but is faster since it avoids looking up the property meta.
      ObjectMap ClassMeta.toObjectMap(Object t)
      Converts an instance of this class to an ObjectMap.
